      • getTransactionYear

        public static final int getTransactionYear(java.util.Date transactionDate,
                                           java.util.Date[] startDates,
                                           java.util.Date[] endDates,
                                           int startYear,
                                           int endYear)
                                    throws java.lang.Exception
        Given a transaction date and the date ranges, return the year for that transaction or 0 if it doesn't belong to any range.
        Parameters:
        transactionDate - The date to evaluate.
        startDates - Array of dates with the first day of each year.
        endDates - Array of dates with the last day of each year.
        startYear - The first year represented in the startDates and endDates ranges.
        Returns:
        The year of the transaction for the calendar represented by the Date ranges. Or 0 if not.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
